audioText: Il était furieux contre son voisin qui avait organisé une fête bruyante jusqu'à trois heures du matin sans prévenir personne.
question: How did he feel about his neighbor?
options: He was furious about the loud party until 3 AM
He was grateful for being invited to celebrate
He was impressed by the party organization
He was understanding about the late celebration
explanation: The text states 'Il était furieux contre son voisin qui avait organisé une fête bruyante jusqu'à trois heures du matin sans prévenir personne.' - 'He was furious with his neighbor who had organized a loud party until three in the morning without warning anyone.' The adjective 'furieux' means furious or very angry.
